x y z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 7 |  | #P_addcl | |- ( ( x e. CC /\ y e. CC ) -> ( x + y ) e. CC ) |
| 8 |  | #P_addass | |- ( ( x e. CC /\ y e. CC /\ z e. CC ) -> ( ( x + y ) + z ) = ( x + ( y + z ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_0cn | |- 0 e. CC |
| 10 |  | #P_addid2 | |- ( x e. CC -> ( 0 + x ) = x ) |

| 12 |  | #P_addcom | |- ( ( -u x e. CC /\ x e. CC ) -> ( -u x + x ) = ( x + -u x ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_mpancom | |- ( x e. CC -> ( -u x + x ) = ( x + -u x ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_negid | |- ( x e. CC -> ( x + -u x ) = 0 ) |
| 15 | 13, 14 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( x e. CC -> ( -u x + x ) = 0 ) |

| 19 | 18 | #P_3adant1 | |- ( ( T. /\ x e. CC /\ y e. CC ) -> ( x x. y ) e. CC ) |
| 20 |  | #P_mulass | |- ( ( x e. CC /\ y e. CC /\ z e. CC ) -> ( ( x x. y ) x. z ) = ( x x. ( y x. z ) ) ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( T. /\ ( x e. CC /\ y e. CC /\ z e. CC ) ) -> ( ( x x. y ) x. z ) = ( x x. ( y x. z ) ) ) |

| 23 | 22 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( T. /\ ( x e. CC /\ y e. CC /\ z e. CC ) ) -> ( x x. ( y + z ) ) = ( ( x x. y ) + ( x x. z ) ) ) |
| 24 |  | #P_adddir | |- ( ( x e. CC /\ y e. CC /\ z e. CC ) -> ( ( x + y ) x. z ) = ( ( x x. z ) + ( y x. z ) ) ) |
| 25 | 24 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( T. /\ ( x e. CC /\ y e. CC /\ z e. CC ) ) -> ( ( x + y ) x. z ) = ( ( x x. z ) + ( y x. z ) ) ) |
| 26 |  | #P_1cnd | |- ( T. -> 1 e. CC ) |
| 27 |  | #P_mulid2 | |- ( x e. CC -> ( 1 x. x ) = x ) |
| 28 | 27 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( T. /\ x e. CC ) -> ( 1 x. x ) = x ) |
| 29 |  | #P_mulid1 | |- ( x e. CC -> ( x x. 1 ) = x ) |
| 30 | 29 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( T. /\ x e. CC ) -> ( x x. 1 ) = x ) |
